## getTestLogger() function

Get a test logger. Returns a null logger unless `verbose` is true or run under debug mode.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getTestLogger(verbose?: boolean): Logger;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  verbose | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Logger
